product_name: First Aid BeautyHydrating Dewy Gel Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid +Ceramides
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFirst Aid Beauty‚Äôs Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream delivers 24-hour hydration for a plump, dewy look ‚Äì lightweight, non-comedogenic, and ideal for oily + combo skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPerfect for oily and combination skinLightweight, dewy moisturizerUltra-sheer gel formula with a breathable feelNon-comedogenicFormulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramides, Squalane, and NiacinamideBoosts skin's moisture + locks it in all dayStrengthens skin's moisture barrierKey IngredientsHyaluronic AcidCeramidesNiacinamideSqualaneResearch ResultsIn a consumer perception study with 50 participants after 1 week:100% of people said that this product made skin feel quenched and refreshed96% agree this product made skin look naturally, dewy, plump and more radiant94% agree this product left skin feeling stronger and more resilientItem 2635396How To UseUse daily in the AM and PM. Apply evenly over clean skin. Can be used alone or layered with other skincare.IngredientsAqua/ Water/ Eau, Glycerin, Squalane, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Betaine, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NP, Colloidal Oatmeal, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Glucoside, Dimethiconol, Polysilicone-11, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 60.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily in the AM and PM. Apply evenly over clean skin. Can be used alone or layered with other skincare.
ingredients: Hydroxyethyl Acrylate Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer

reviews.headline: This is my new everyday moisturizer.
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is light and not greasy. I use in the morning first thing before applying my makeup and at night before going to bed. I have sensitive skin so I appreciate the fact that it is not perfumy or has additives that are unnecessary.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: The best moisturizer I have ever tried for combo oily skin. My face, neck, and chest is so soft. No pore clogging ingredients. Quickly became a holy grail for me.

reviews.headline: I do like it but...
reviews.comments: I do really like this product. It feels really nice going on and hydrating but after a little while it seems like my face feels a little greasy and I not sure if that is the case or if I am just that hydrated lol. I wish they had mini samples that people could try before buying the big jar :/ if you have an oily t zone, this may not be the product for you.

reviews.headline: 100% would repurchase!!
reviews.comments:
This product has truly transformed my skin‚Äî I have textured skin with a combination of normal to oily (in my t-zone), and it works great with maintaining my moisture barrier!
My skin has become so soft since using, even my boyfriend noticed (he notices nothing everü§£)
Buy it!!

reviews.headline: Nice but sticky
reviews.comments: I would recommend this product to those with dry skin. I dont believe i'm the ideal user for this as my skin is more oily and it left me a little sticky.

reviews.headline: My favorite morning moisturizer!!
reviews.comments: I love first aid beauty and I took a chance on their new dewy gel moisturizer and I am obsessed. My skin looks so luminous and glowy with and without makeup! I wish they made a bigger size because I literally ran out of it in a month. My skin is hydrated and I especially love that it doesnt irritate my sensitive skin. 10/10

reviews.headline: Fine
reviews.comments: It feels nice on the skin, but it makes my front hair pieces SO greasy. There are other gel-cream moisturizers that do the same job and don't leave my hair greasy when it touches my face.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is amazing! I have very oily skin normally, but I was getting dry patches. I needed something light that worked and wouldn't cause breakouts. This on my skin was everything and more! I actually use it every night now!

reviews.headline: Gel cream
reviews.comments: This product is nice. Its smooth consistency makes it easy to spread. Its a little too light for a night cream for me since my skin is dry but it works so well in the morning and sits nicely under my makeup.

reviews.headline: Part of my daily routine!
reviews.comments: I love this product doesn't leave face oily at all. Perfect for oily skin or combination skin. I use it with the first beauty face wash everyday.

reviews.headline: FINALLY
reviews.comments: I'm 37 with reactive combination skin that leans dry. I also have seborrheic dermatitis.  That said, for YEARS I have tried to find a moisturizer that doesn't make my skin irritated, or cause breakouts or flare-ups. I've spent hundreds of dollars over my lifetime in pursuit of something works. This one is absolutely PERFECT. It's lightweight, hydrating, and absorbs into the skin quickly. Seriously, it's like a drink of water. If I'm feeling a little dry after using actives, I add a little of the ilia base face Milk, and they play so well together. Thank you, FAB, for giving me hope that there is actually a moisturizer that works for my skin.

reviews.headline: Finally, the perfect combo skin moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have been looking forever for a moisturizer that is not too light, not too heavy, not too goopy and not sticky for my combo to dry skin. This is it. Sinks in quickly, does not pill, does not feel sticky or tacky, does not feel too heavy. Just lovely, soft skin. Layers great over my other skincare and under my foundation as well.

reviews.headline: YES!!!
reviews.comments: This stuff is like if Kiehl's ultra facial cream and Clinique moisture surge had a baby‚Ä¶ but even better!!! I have dry/combo skin and I absolutely LOVE this for night and morning. It feels like a dream, hydrates well, absorbs quickly, and has zero scent. My new Holy grail product for sure. It's perfect under sunscreen and skin tint with no oiliness or pilling as well. First Aid Beauty knocks it out of the park once again.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: So hydrating!! Ive tried the colloid oatmeal moisturizer but this is 10x better!

reviews.headline: Hydrating gel cream
reviews.comments: I got to try the Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream Moisturizer from First Aid Beauty and I'm amazed! This cream is so cooling and soothing to my skin. After applying it, my face feels calmer, moisturized, and plump. Visually, my skin was radiant! No dry spots, a bouncy plumpness, and less redness. The ingredients are really nice for me. This would go best for oily skin types I believe. Personally, the ultra rich moisturizer suits my really dry skin better during the winter, but the formula of this gel cream is perfect for me for summer days when I am less dry and want a lighter formula. I love barrier support and this gives me that. Love it!

reviews.headline: hydrating moisturizer
reviews.comments: I recently got my hands on the First Aid Beauty Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream Moisturizer and I love how hydrating my skin feels after using! This sits very well under my makeup and I sometimes use it as a primer. This is great for all skin types, including people with sensitive skin. This did not irritate my skin at al!

reviews.headline: How is this replacing the coconut water cream?!
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, my favorite moisturizer that I've been using for years has been discontinued (the Coconut Water Cream Moisturizer), so I decided to try FAB's new moisturizer and it's awful (for me). I have very oily skin in the spring and summer, and normal skin with dry patches at times in the fall and winter. I also suffer from acne. When I read that this is supposed to be lightweight, breathable, and non-oily, I thought it would be a great replacement but I was incredibly wrong. It's heavy and extremely oily. I only used a dime-size amount for my entire face and neck but even that felt like way too much! It never fully absorbed into my skin and I cannot stand the feeling of a greasy product sitting on my face. This will most likely be perfect for those with super dry skin but this isn't the one for the oily fam! FAB, PLEASE BRING BACK THE COCONUT WATER CREAM!!! PLEASE!!! IT'S THE ONLY MOISTURIZER THAT HAS WORKED FOR ME FOR 6 YEARS!!! :(

reviews.headline: The drink your skin needs!
reviews.comments: I love this cream so much, I keep mine in my skin fridge and whenever I apply it gives me such a great hydrating cooling effect on my skin. Feels like I had 30glasses of water honestly so hydrating and plumping! And the formula also absorbs nicely and its not a sticky cream. I love it so much

reviews.headline: Nice lightweight moisturizer
reviews.comments: I'm really enjoying this product so far. I usually use a lightweight moisturizer during the day and this one car exceeded my expectations. It's a nice creamy consistency but not too thick, it goes on so smoothly and my skin feels soft and not overly moisturized.

reviews.headline: favorite daytime hydration
reviews.comments: my skin love to get oily by the end of day which makes having a more natural look challenging but i love that this moisturizer leaves the perfect dewy look without getting oily

media.headline: glass of water for your skin
media.caption: Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream

faceoff_positive.comments: I recently tried the First Aid Beauty Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream Moisturizer, and it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. Here's my breakdown of why I love it: The texture is light, cooling, and refreshing. It has a gel-cream consistency that feels like a burst of hydration as soon as it hits the skin. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy or sticky residue, making it perfect for day use or under makeup. The combination of hyaluronic acid and ceramides provides a powerful moisture boost that leaves my skin feeling plump, soft, and nourished. My skin tends to get dry, especially during colder months, and this moisturizer has been a game-changer in keeping my skin hydrated throughout the day. True to its name, the "dewy" effect is real! It gives my complexion a natural, healthy glow without making it look shiny or oily. I've noticed that my skin appears more radiant, with a smooth finish. I have combination skin, and I've found this product to be gentle yet effective. It doesn't clog my pores or feel heavy, so I believe it could work for a variety of skin types, from dry to oily, especially if you're looking for hydration without the heaviness of a cream. The scent is very subtle and pleasant, not overpowering, which is great for those with sensitive skin or noses. Overall, the First Aid Beauty Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream is a fantastic, lightweight moisturizer that delivers on hydration, smoothness, and a dewy glow. It's a great option for anyone looking for an everyday moisturizer that's both effective and soothing. If you have dry or dehydrated skin, I highly recommend giving it a try!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing

faceoff_negative.comments: Unfortunately, my favorite moisturizer that I've been using for years has been discontinued (the Coconut Water Cream Moisturizer), so I decided to try FAB's new moisturizer and it's awful (for me). I have very oily skin in the spring and summer, and normal skin with dry patches at times in the fall and winter. I also suffer from acne. When I read that this is supposed to be lightweight, breathable, and non-oily, I thought it would be a great replacement but I was incredibly wrong. It's heavy and extremely oily. I only used a dime-size amount for my entire face and neck but even that felt like way too much! It never fully absorbed into my skin and I cannot stand the feeling of a greasy product sitting on my face. This will most likely be perfect for those with super dry skin but this isn't the one for the oily fam! FAB, PLEASE BRING BACK THE COCONUT WATER CREAM!!! PLEASE!!! IT'S THE ONLY MOISTURIZER THAT HAS WORKED FOR ME FOR 6 YEARS!!! :(

rollup.name: Hydrating Dewy Gel Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid +Ceramides
